reg_info.act_under: Municipality of Metropolitan Toronto Act   Loi sur la municipalité de la communauté urbaine de Toronto

content.content: 1. (1) Effective on the 1st day of December, 1988, The Municipality of Metropolitan Toronto is divided into twenty-eight metropolitan wards. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 1 (1). (2) Each metropolitan ward consists of the lands described in Schedule 1 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 1 (2). (3) One metropolitan councillor shall be elected from each metropolitan ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Effective on the 1st day of December, 1988, The Municipality of Metropolitan Toronto is divided into twenty-eight metropolitan wards. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 1 (1).

(2) Each metropolitan ward consists of the lands described in Schedule 1 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 1 (2).

(3) One metropolitan councillor shall be elected from each metropolitan ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 1 (3).

content.content: 2. (1) The area municipality of the Borough of East York consists of the four local wards described in Schedule 2 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 2 (1). (2) Two councillors shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The area municipality of the Borough of East York consists of the four local wards described in Schedule 2 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 2 (1).

(2) Two councillors shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. (1) Effective on the 1st day of December, 1988, the area municipality of the City of Etobicoke is divided into twelve local wards. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 3 (1). (2) Each local ward consists of the lands described in Schedule 3 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 3 (2). (3) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 3 (3).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) Effective on the 1st day of December, 1988, the area municipality of the City of Etobicoke is divided into twelve local wards. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 3 (1).

(2) Each local ward consists of the lands described in Schedule 3 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 3 (2).

(3) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 3 (3).

content.content: 4. (1) The area municipality of the City of North York consists of the fourteen local wards set out in Schedule 4 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 4 (1). (2) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) The area municipality of the City of North York consists of the fourteen local wards set out in Schedule 4 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 4 (1).

(2) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 4 (2).

content.content: 5. (1) The area municipality of the City of Scarborough consists of the fourteen local wards described in Schedule 5 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 5 (1). (2) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 5 (2).

5. (1) The area municipality of the City of Scarborough consists of the fourteen local wards described in Schedule 5 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 5 (1).

(2) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 5 (2).

content.content: 6. (1) Effective on the 1st day of December, 1988, the area municipality of the City of Toronto is divided into sixteen local wards. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 6 (1). (2) Each local ward consists of the lands described in Schedule 6 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 6 (2). (3) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 6 (3).

6. (1) Effective on the 1st day of December, 1988, the area municipality of the City of Toronto is divided into sixteen local wards. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 6 (1).

(2) Each local ward consists of the lands described in Schedule 6 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 6 (2).

(3) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 6 (3).

content.content: 7. (1) The area municipality of the City of York consists of the eight local wards described in Schedule 7 to Ontario Regulation 188/88 as it read on December 31, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 7 (1). (2) One councillor shall be elected from each local ward. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 825, s. 7 (2).
